resources.string: One of our representative will get in touch with you shortly.
Be it a planned meeting or an unplanned emergency, a shopping spree or a movie, new in the city or a new area, avail our hourly services for all of these and many more.\n

Your weekend get away or a business trip can now be their mini holiday or a fun filled plan. Get in touch with us to plan fun weekends for your parents/grand parents.Gift a weekend surprise and lots more.\n

Travel guilt free. We take care of everything from their food to medical emergencies in your absence. Your trip can be a fun experience for them. Yes it is possible now. Get in touch with us and watch the magic happen.\n

Be sure of happiness and well being of the senior citizen\'s of your family.Â We are here for them while you are always there for them.We will help you in taking care of your loved ones in the best way. We can together make second innings happier.\n

From weekly get together to gardening, self publishing books, we have it all. You just have to decide what you want to do and we arrange it for you. You can choose from our vast options and add many more.\n

Some of the activities are:
 1. Snooker and Billiards (at KSBA, coaching available)
 2. Badminton
 3. Swimming
 4. Water Aerobics
 5. Bridge
 6. Crochet
 7. Bird Watching
 8. Eco Camps
 9. Paper Quilling
 10. Board Game evenings
 11. Hydroponic Gardening
 12. Yoga
 13. Meditation
 14. Photography
 15. Painting
 16. Knitting
 17. Music
 18. Foreign Language learning
 19. Book Readings
 20. Talks and Sessions (will be informed to the members periodically).
